items.text: The quarterly report indicates a significant increase in our market share.
items.translation_uz: Choraklik hisobot bizning bozor ulushimizda sezilarli o'sishni ko'rsatadi.

items.text: We need to schedule a meeting with the stakeholders to discuss the proposal.
items.translation_uz: Biz taklifni muhokama qilish uchun manfaatdor tomonlar bilan uchrashuv belgilashimiz kerak.

items.text: The marketing department has launched a new advertising campaign.
items.translation_uz: Marketing bo'limi yangi reklama kampaniyasini boshladi.

items.text: Our company is planning to expand into the Asian market next year.
items.translation_uz: Kompaniyamiz kelasi yili Osiyo bozoriga kirishni rejalashtirmoqda.

items.text: The board of directors approved the budget for the new project.
items.translation_uz: Direktorlar kengashi yangi loyiha uchun byudjetni tasdiqladi.

items.text: Customer satisfaction surveys show that our service quality has improved.
items.translation_uz: Mijozlar qoniqishi so'rovnomalari xizmat sifatimiz yaxshilanganini ko'rsatadi.

items.text: We are implementing new strategies to enhance productivity and efficiency.
items.translation_uz: Biz mahsuldorlik va samaradorlikni oshirish uchun yangi strategiyalarni joriy etmoqdamiz.

items.text: The deadline for submitting the financial report is next Friday.
items.translation_uz: Moliyaviy hisobotni topshirish muddati kelasi juma.

items.text: Our team successfully negotiated a partnership with the international firm.
items.translation_uz: Jamoamiz xalqaro firma bilan hamkorlik bo'yicha muvaffaqiyatli muzokaralar olib bordi.

items.text: The conference call with our overseas clients is scheduled for tomorrow.
items.translation_uz: Chet eldagi mijozlarimiz bilan konferens-qo'ng'iroq ertaga rejalashtirilgan.

items.text: We have received positive feedback regarding our customer support services.
items.translation_uz: Biz mijozlarga xizmat ko'rsatish bo'yicha ijobiy fikrlar oldik.

items.text: The sales figures for this quarter exceeded our initial expectations.
items.translation_uz: Ushbu chorakdagi savdo ko'rsatkichlari dastlabki kutganimizdan oshdi.

items.text: Management has decided to restructure the organization for better performance.
items.translation_uz: Rahbariyat yaxshi ishlash uchun tashkilotni qayta tuzishga qaror qildi.

items.text: The investment portfolio has shown consistent growth over the past year.
items.translation_uz: Investitsiya portfeli o'tgan yil davomida barqaror o'sishni ko'rsatdi.

items.text: Our human resources department is recruiting new talent for the expansion.
items.translation_uz: Kadrlar bo'limimiz kengayish uchun yangi iste'dodlarni yollamoqda.
